entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Rain north of Hare Bay in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm north of Hare Bay. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
